attributes.action: persuade Gordon Sumner, a.k.a "Sting" to remake all of Nick Nolte's films in order to make him, Sumner, a better bloke.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Campaign For Sting For Nolte is a movement that has grown in stature in recent times.  The aim is to persuade Gordon Sumner, a.k.a. "Sting" to put down his lute and agree to remake all of Nick Nolte's films in order to become a better bloke.  This campaign is headed by Dr Allen Malcolm, a renowned academic from Edinburgh University.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
